name: Story of the Olivia
description:
Story

Olivia Carter immigrated west from Europe to her family, unaware of what was going to happen to her.
she has to earn money to survive.

Join olivia's story and uphold the law. As you take on missions, the story will expand and you will find yourself in the adventure.

Regions

Wild West

These townspeople are kind of weird. Meet with the sheriff. The sheriff is largely responsible for the security of the town.
Help an old and mysterious man Charlie and the desperate Oliver who is waiting for help and get involved in the story of the mysterious town.

Mysterious Town

A town free from all threats and its surroundings sheltered from bandit attack.
Featuring the strange stories and quests of certain people for help against bandits.
A mysterious environment awaits. Complete the quests and join the adventure.

Weapons:

  • Rifle
  • shotgun
  • Revolver with 3 types and different styles
  • hunting knife
  • ax
  • Rocket (Walls can break)



Tasks:

  • Fortress Raid (Take this fortress, the bandit's greatest defense and venue)

  • Old Indian (A group of gangs ambushed an old Indian and his family. Investigate the case)

  • Toxic Mine (Kill these thugs who are mining poison mines for money making and restore security)

  • Train Raid ( Bandits ambushed the train and destroyed the train track. You must kill them and ensure safety)

  • Billy the Kid (Find this famous and terrifying man before he finds you dead or alive)

  • Bear Invasion (Many bears invading the forest in the north harm Humans.Kill the bears)

  • Mining Quest (Help the family trapped in the mining factory)

  • Lost tomb (you have to find the tomb of someone named Oscar mentioned by a mysterious elder)

  • Factory Road (The biggest source of income is in the hands of bandits. Recapture the Factory)

  • Save from Execution (A group of gangs is about to kill a person they hold responsible for the death of one of their families. Investigate the case.)

  • Lost Ring (Barbara mentions a ring that belonged to her sister. You have to find it and return it to Barbara)
